intro.mainTitle:
The Standard of
 Music Plagiarism Check, MIPPIA
intro.mainTitleMobile:
The Standard of 
Music Plagiarism Check, 
MIPPIA

section1.mainTitle: Shaping the Future of Music Protection
section1.content1: AI divides thousands of songs into 4-bar and compares their substantial similarities to find songs with high plagiarism rates.
section1.content1Mobile: AI divides thousands of songs into 4-bar and compares their substantial similarities to find songs with high plagiarism rates.
section1.content2: Our goal is to protect creators' copyright and intellectual property rights, and further, to create a music ecosystem that maximizes the creativity.
section1.content2Mobile: Our goal is to protect creators' copyright and intellectual property rights, and further, to create a music ecosystem that maximizes the creativity.
section1.content3: Through AI music analysis technology, it analyzes the song structure, rhythm, melody, harmony of music to detect plagiarized songs among many other songs.
section1.content3Mobile: Through AI music analysis technology, it analyzes the song structure, rhythm, melody, harmony of music to detect plagiarized songs among many other songs.

section2.mainTitle: MIPPIA service changes your daily life
section2.content1: Before releasing albums or selling musics, plagiarism checks can prepare you for plagiarism risks. AI automatically detects any accidental copy of your songs, protecting your music IP.
section2.content1Mobile: Before releasing albums or selling musics, plagiarism checks can prepare you for plagiarism risks. AI automatically detects any accidental copy of your songs, protecting your music IP.
section2.content2: When buying songs from other composers, plagiarism checks ensure the song's originality, preventing any future plagiarism disputes before releasing your album.
section2.content2Mobile: When buying songs from other composers, plagiarism checks ensure the song's originality, preventing any future plagiarism disputes before releasing your album.
section2.content3: If you discover a song that you suspect is a plagiarized version of your favorite artist's work, you can check for plagiarism.
section2.content3Mobile: If you discover a song that you suspect is a plagiarized version of your favorite artist's work, you can check for plagiarism.
section2.content4: Before you invest in a song, check if it's original to prevent potential financial losses due to plagiarism risks.
section2.content4Mobile: Before you invest in a song, check if it's original to prevent potential financial losses due to plagiarism risks.

index.mainIntro:
Do you need a plagiarism check before releasing an album?
 Do you want to know if anyone has plagiarized your music?
 You can check it for free.
index.mainIntroPhone:
Do you need a plagiarism check before
 releasing an album? Do you want to know if
 anyone has plagiarized your music?
 You can check it for free.

1.title:
Music IP Protection & 
Management Solution
1.content1: Start a free AI music plagiarism test with MIPPIA's music analysis technology to avoid legal issues before releasing your album.
1.content2: We can identify plagiarized music from billions of songs released globally every day. Safeguard your music IP with our real-time plagiarism monitoring service.
1.content2ImgContent:
A similar composition to yours has been 
found. Access the plagiarism report?
1.content3: Through MIPPIA, protect your copyrights from unknown plagiarism and maximize revenue of your music IP.

3.title: Introduction
3.content1: To protect creators' copyrights and intellectual property, to create a music ecosystem that maximizes the value of creativity.
3.content2: AI divides thousands of songs into four-bar segments and compares their substantive similarities to identify songs with high levels of plagiarism.
3.content3: Through AI music analysis technology, it analyzes the structure, rhythm, melody, harmony, and more to detect plagiarized songs. It identifies plagiarized songs among many and safeguards the original creator's music IP.

4.title:
Protect your 
 music copyrights 
 with MIPPIA.
4.content:
MIPPIA protects the original creator's music intellectual property.
 Check for any songs that are suspected of plagiarism using MIPPIA.
4.contentmobile:
MIPPIA protects the original creator's music intellectual property.
 Check for any songs that are suspected of plagiarism using MIPPIA.

step1.title: 1. Sign Up and Login
step1.text: Please sign up and login with your Google email account

step2.title: 2. Selecting Options for Plagiarism Check
step2.text: Depending on whether the music you want to check has vocals or not, select the appropriate option: Vocal, Inst.
step2.textMobile: Depending on whether the music you want to check has vocals or not, select the appropriate option: Vocal, Inst.

step3.title: 3. Uploading Music Files and Music Links
step3.text: Depending on the selected option, upload the audio file (such as mp3, wav files) or enter the music link.
step3.textMobile: Depending on the selected option, upload the audio file (such as mp3, wav files) or enter the music link.

step4.title: 4. Plagiarism Check and Monitoring
step4.text:
We extract the top songs with the highest plagiarism rate from the audio data we currently hold.
The plagiarism check is based on the melody plagiarism rate for 4 bars. 
The detailed check results display the suspected plagiarism sections.
step4.textMobile: We extract the top songs with the highest plagiarism rate from the audio data we currently hold. The plagiarism check is based on the melody plagiarism rate for 4 bars. The detailed check results display the suspected plagiarism sections.

step5.title: 5. Check the Results
step5.text:
Once the plagiarism check is complete, you can review the results.
The results provide the overall plagiarism rate, suspected plagiarism sections, 
section plagiarism rate, melody, harmony, and the option to listen to the audio by section.
step5.textMobile: Once the plagiarism check is complete, you can review the results.The results provide the overall plagiarism rate, suspected plagiarism sections, section plagiarism rate, melody, harmony, and the option to listen to the audio by section.

step6.title: 6. Download Results
step6.text: The results are provided in PDF format.

then upload the track.
